name: Podiatry
description: A podiatrist can help if your feet or legs are injured or unwell. You might have: - Problems walking - Pain in your lower limbs - Issues from diabetes - Bunions - Stress from sports activities - Injuries
fullDescription: A podiatrist can help if your feet or legs are injured or unwell. You might have: - Problems walking - Pain in your lower limbs - Issues from diabetes - Bunions - Stress from sports activities - Injuries
whatTheyOffer: A podiatrist can help if your feet or legs are injured or unwell. You might have: - Problems walking - Pain in your lower limbs - Issues from diabetes - Bunions - Stress from sports activities - Injuries
howToGetIt: To receive care from a specialty doctor, you will need a referral. Please see your primary care doctor or provider for a referral.
